repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:11

# create dir
WORKDIR /srv/master-service

# get dependencies
COPY package*.json ./

# get source code
COPY src ./src

# get build files
COPY gulpfile.js ./
COPY ts*.json ./

# install npm dependencies
RUN npm ci
RUN npm i -g gulp && npm cache clean --force;

# build app from source
RUN gulp build

CMD [ "node", "dist/server.js", "--interface", "eth0" ]
